Title: Bad Blood
Plot: After a failed hit on her life, Bianca, Chicago's most powerful vampire, calls upon Harry Dresden.  In debt to her for saving his life years before, he agrees to help her find the mastermind behind the plan to take her down.
GuestStars: Simon Northwood,  Michael Copeman,  Lyriq Bent,  Layton Morrison,  Laura Vandervoort,  Kent Staines,  Joanne Kelly,  Jane McLean
